DOC.brief_summary: Drinking probiotics in a the form of a yogurt drink will restore normal gastrointestinal (GI) bacteria in patients whose colon are colonized with vancomycin-resistant enterococcus (VRE).
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Probiotics on Vancomycin-Resistant Enterococcus
DOC.criteria: VRE positive patients with GI colonization Age less than 18 years Patients who have had a bone marrow transplant Extreme short bowel patients (less than 100 cm small bowel remaining) Patients with active VRE infection but no GI colonization Patients unable to eat and have no feeding access Patients who do not have a power of attorney to give consent if they are unable to
